title: Definitions
context: ยง462A-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of the department of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;License&rdquo; means a pilot&rsquo;s license issued pursuant to this chapter. &ldquo;Pilot&rdquo; means a state pilot licensed pursuant to this chapter as a port pilot or a deputy port pilot. &ldquo;Pilotage waters&rdquo; means the waters of this State covered by this chapter. &ldquo;Vessel&rdquo; means every description of watercraft, other than a seaplane on the water, used or capable of being used as a means of transportation on water. Each tug and each of its tows shall be considered a separate vessel. [L 1978, c 231, pt of ยง2; am L 1985, c 126, ยง1] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted.
